product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Mocha Mousse Pie - 2 Servings
long_description: Smooth, chocolate-mocha mousse pie with a graham cracker topping. Ready in an instant: just mix contents of package with water, sprinkle topping over the surface, let stand, and then serve. A delicious dessert and reward for camping or backpacking trips. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9. May contain traces of peanuts and/or tree nuts.
short_description: Smooth, chocolate-mocha mousse pie with a graham cracker topping.
